segments.text: May , look , what's that in the cage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you know that ? It's panda .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course I know . I just can't see it very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , then put on your glasses , and do you know what does the panda eat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also know they are given to other countries as gifts for friendship .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really , panda is my favorite animal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Any way , in a word , panda is our friend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know other famous animals in the world ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , let me think , the kangaroo and koala bear from Australia are very famous .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . OK , let's move on .
segments.speaker: S2
